definition[0]: a beam of radiation(1) that can go through solid objects and is used for photographing the inside of the body
definition[1]: a photograph of part of someone’s body, taken using X-rays to see if anything is wrong
example[0]: The X-ray showed that her leg was not broken.
definition[2]: a medical examination made using X-rays
example[1]: I had to go to hospital for an X-ray.
definition[3]: to photograph the inside of someone’s body using X-rays
example[3]: The problem was only discovered when her lungs were X-rayed.
